description: [Status: stable] [Name: ambiguous-function-name] [Message: Ambiguous function name: {name}] What it does Checks for the use of the characters 'l', 'O', or 'I' as function names. Why is this bad? In some fonts, these characters are indistinguishable from the numerals one and zero. When tempted to use 'l', use 'L' instead. Example def l(x): ... Use instead: def long_name(x): ...
